description:
A24 is often recognized for the bold and original projects released under their label. In more recent years, however, A24 has been eager to compete with other mainstream studios, having notably attached themselves to a Friday the 13th television series titled Crystal Lake. Now A24 seems to have set their sights on remaking a cult [...]

The post A24 Reportedly Remaking Cult Classic 80s Movie appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: A24 Reportedly Remaking Cult Classic 80s Movie

description:
The next installment in the Marvel Cinematic Universe‘s Avengers series is starting production. The new film, titled Avengers: Doomsday, will united several superhero groups against a common threat: Robert Downey Jr. as Doctor Doom. Unfortunately, one Marvel star has given a disappointing update regarding whether or not they’ll return to the MCU in Avengers: Doomsday. [...]

The post Marvel MCU Star Gives Disappointing Update On ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Marvel MCU Star Gives Disappointing Update On ‘Avengers: Doomsday’
